reviewText: Found this one in the middle of the night on cable and loved it.  Wish it was on dvd, but will still watch again. Loved it
It was a fun heart-warming movie that so much reminded me of some of my friends and also how important friendship is in our lives.
Although it starts out very sad.....as we all long for  this relationship...it turns into a great story.  Loved every part of it.  I watch it over and over again.

This was a warm movie of human drama mixed with sadness and a lot of humor. I purchased several movies from AMAZON and this was among our favorites.
My husband and I both enjoyed it.
The play I saw at Ladysmith's Little Theatre got in all the highlights without the swearing.  Much more enjoyable for me.

I enjoyed this movie, it was very miscast but it has a charm all its own.
The cast is stellar and the movie does hold your attention.

So, if you want a nice movie see this one.

I have always loved this movie with three great actress's. Any one who is older and can relate to losing a husband then trying to start over..will like this movie. It has funny moments and tearful ones, but overall is a great movie.
It really is changed too much from the original play.  Changing characters names is just too much of a change.

The Cemetery Club has been one of my favorite movies for years.  Before purchasing the movie through Amazon, I had been searching all video stores for the movie.  I wished I had thought of Amazon before searching for the movie elsewhere because it was so easy to find on Amazon and just as easy to puchase, as well.

The Cemetery Club is a movie for all ages.  It is especially fun to watch with family members.  The cast is fantastic;  Danny Aiello, Olympia Dukakis, Ellyn Bursten and Diane Ladd and Christina Ricci has a small part in the film as a young girl.

I highly recommend this movie.
The rest were good but she is my love ----always.  Will you see her best film?  Same Time Next Year?

I chose this rating because of the quick delivery and the satisfaction I have with the movie itself.  The DVD works with no problems and it is a wonderful movie.
This movie reiterates the wonderful gift of living in the day!  Death is inevitable, living life to the fullest is optional!!

I received prompt service and movie is top condition.
This is an excellent movie. I had seen it a few years ago. But, I have never seen it in any stores so that I could purchase my own copy.
I was delighted to find it on Amazon.

I am giving this movie 5 stars because it is well acted and has a story line that most people over 55 could relate to.  I would say it is more a woman's film but Danny Aiello who plays the part of a retired cop who lost his wife is a good representative for the male viewer to also enjoy the this film.  I have watched this movie countless times over the past few years.  I recommend this movie to anyone who I feel would like to spend a few hours with people who are learning to cope with the unexpected change to their life.  There are tears, laughs but through it all friendships that help them move forward and look forward to the new journey.  You may also appreciate some of the background music that is in a few scenes.  Is this movie somewhat old fashioned yes but in a rather contemporary way and that for me makes it a movie I would and do recommend to my neighbors who are over 55.

I saw this movie years ago and loved it and was thrilled to be able to get it and enjoy it whenever I want to.  Sad, thoughtful, realistic...we will all face these changes in our lives.  It's how we live after them that matters.
There was humor, sadness a bit of confussion like all the girls and they played the parts well so four stars.

Well done and with a superb cast, this story is meaningful to those of us who have friends that have celebrated the events of our lives and will be there when we say goodbye to the people that made life great. It will make you laugh, make you cry, and will definitely be a movie you will want to share.
A hilarious movie!  Loved it, I couldn't stop laughing!!  It came promptly and befor I had told it would be here!!  I recommend this movie!!
For those who have experienced the loss of a beloved spouse, this movie captured the struggle of "keeping on keeping on."  It's work!  Faith, humor and friendships make it possible.

I watched this movie based solely on the cast, I'd watch them just sitting on a bench. The writers created a story that addressed a very painful topic that encourages the audience a rare journey inside the characters lives. I laughed, ached, cried and learned some life lessons that will me my entire life.
